__e: I read on the weekend and then I got a callback last night and I didn't want to miss it.
But I heard her read that letter... and more than anything... she wanted to be that woman.
I was sent to his house to read official report. I had to tell his family that his son died of tragic accident. And I lied.
- that we just got back from them?
Okay, can I read you what I got right now?
Why don't you read to me what you wrote last night?
